resources.string:
• News Feed App is to get the Breaking News and to get the News in Customizable way 

• User can do search, filter based on the categories, countries, etc.. 

• User can bookmark any news article and can see the bookmarked news articles

• On opening the open, the user will be landing on Home Page will bottom Nav Bar and Overflow menu at top right 

• The Bottom Nav Bar contains Home Tab, Settings Tab, Bookmarks Tab 

• The overflow menu contains the navigation for About App Page and Help Page 

• On Clicking Settings Tab on the bottom Nav Bar, user will land on Settings Page and can customise their app 

• On Clicking Bookmarks Tab, user will land on Bookmarks Page and can see all bookmarked articles
